text: Preparing the Cookie Dough After the butter has softened enough, put the two sticks of butter in the larger bowl and cream it well until very smooth.  Add the sugar and continue to beat until very light, before adding the vanilla extract.  Add the vanilla extract and continue to beat until very light.  Add the sifted flour and mix well.  Fold in the chopped walnuts by hand with a spatula.  Baking the Cookies Take about a teaspoon sized amount of dough and shape it into a ball. Place the unbaked cookies on the cookie sheet approximately one inch apart from each other. Bake at 345 degrees for 15 minutes. If you use a timer, start checking about five minutes ahead of time. Not all ovens distribute heat the same unless you are using a confectioner's oven. Moreover, oven temperatures can vary. When the cookies have a light golden color, remove the cookies from the oven.  Let the cookies cool slightly. Then roll in confectioner's sugar and set on the wax paper for cooling. Once the cookies are cooled, place the cookies in your sealed container... if they make it that far. Enjoy!
